title: Godzilla: Age of Monsters
description: Noriko Yoshiwara's world changed that fateful day her father discovered the big "rock." Little did she know that the discovery became Godzilla's wake-up call and set the pace for her life's work -- studying the King of the Monsters. Follow her lead and the scientist team called G-Force through Godzilla's adventures as he battles Hero Zero, Charles Barkley, and more!
author: Randy Stradley
